original_title: AIA’s top performers shine in France at the prestigious President Club Convention
original_body_lines: Congratulations to AIA Insurance’s outstanding Wealth Planners, who represented Sri Lanka at the magnificent AIA President Club Convention in Cannes, France. This exclusive event, hosted for the very best across all AIA markets, celebrates top performers and has traditionally been held in exotic destinations worldwide. Marking its 12th consecutive year, Sri Lanka’s participation highlighted AIA Sri Lanka’s consistent excellence at this prestigious global event.
This year, 268 elite Leaders and Agents from 18 different AIA markets convened in France for a truly unique convention that blended training, inspiration, leisure and awards across 5 days.
